name: Scream of the Viking
description: Scream of the Viking is a hardcore 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you pass various levels playing for the last of Vikings. In this game you need to collect items, overcome various traps and obstacles in order to help the Viking get to his home. Once you collect all the items on the level, you will open the door to the Viking house, passing through which you will find yourself on another level. Be careful and attentive as the further development of the game depends on your every step. But do not be sad if you suddenly die, your level just starts again and you can try one more time .
